div.p: LIS WIEHL'S BOOK. FINALLY THE FACTOR TIP OF THE

BUT SOME MOTHERS ARE POSSIBLE LEMATIC.
ADDICTION. EMOTIONAL PROBLEMS ALL CAN MAKE
A MOTHER TOX EXISTENCES TO HER CHILDREN.
WE ALL KNOW BAD PARENTS BUT MOST HAVE NOT EXPERIENCED ONE.
FOR THOSE WHO HAVE, I HAVE ONLY ONE THOUGHT.
HELP THE OFFENDING PARENT IF YOU CAN.
STAY AWAY IF YOU CAN'T. BUT ABOVE ALL -- FORGIVE THEM.
FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY. AND THAT IS IT FOR US TONIGHT.
